description: The foundation of your VentureLayer system, the Tencel™ Modal and merino blend naturally regulates temperature, wicks moisture, and feels soft. It packs into its pocket for compact transport, and – like everything in the VentureLayer series – it is part of a versatile, adaptable layering system created to keep you warm, dry, and protected across a range of adventures and conditions.
name: Royal Robbins Venturelayer 200 Henley LS - Mens
